mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_basic_channel (account_id, channel_code, channel_name, channel_type_sign, support_way, third_company, channel_source, basic_trade_rate, basic_withdraw_fee, basic_balance_type, basic_settle_type, limit_amount, is_need, channel_company, status )VALUES( #{accountId}, #{channelCode}, #{channelName}, #{channelTypeSign}, #{supportWay}, #{thirdCompany}, #{channelSource}, #{basicTradeRate}, #{basicWithdrawFee}, #{basicBalanceType}, #{basicSettleType}, #{limitAmount}, #{isNeed}, #{channelCompany}, #{status} )
